#article-container .timeline.blue { --timeline-color: #428bca; --timeline-bg: rgba(66,139,202, 0.2);}.timeline .headline { background: #49a6e9!important;}#article-container .timeline { border: none;}.timeline-item { border-radius: 20px; background: #fff; padding: 10px; margin: 30px 0!important;}#article-container .timeline .timeline-item { margin: 0 0 15px;}.timeline { margin: 0!important; padding: 0!important;}#article-container .timeline { border: none;}#article-container .timeline { margin: 0 0 20px 10px; padding: 14px 20px 5px; border-left: 2px solid var(#428bca, #49b1f5); border: none;}.timeline { margin: 0!important; padding: 0!important;}* { -webkit-box-sizing: border-box; -moz-box-sizing: border-box; box-sizing: border-box;}* { scrollbar-width: thin; scrollbar-color: var(--scrollbar-color) transparent;}#article-container { font-size: 16px;}#article-container .timeline .timeline-item.headline .timeline-item-title .item-circle > p { font-weight: 600; font-size: 25px;}#article-container .timeline .timeline-item .timeline-item-content { position: relative; padding: 10px 15px; border-radius: 8px; background: none; font-size: 0.93em;}/* å·¦è¾¹åœ†åœˆ */#article-container .timeline .timeline-item .item-circle:before{ display: none;}.timeline-item .timeline-item-title .item-circle{padding-left:5px;}#article-container .timeline .timeline-item .item-circle > p { margin: 0 0 0 10px; font-weight: 500; font-size: 24px;}
